column4: hi- i cant connect to google but can connect to all otehr websites, other PCs on the network can access googel well. /etc/hosts is standard.what can i do?
can you get to http://74.125.67.100/ (google.com)
no
i get connected after about 10 minutes, i tried with other google IPs
i can ping google no problem, i tried opera and links -both cant access google as well!
strange ..
very,,,,,,
how does  wget fare?    wget http://google.com
resolved well but stuck on the "(72.14.235.104)"
stuck on the Connecting to www.google.com|72.14.235.99|:80...
any firewall/traffic shaping rules in place that you're aware of?
actually i didnt set up this system, the company is on holiday (easter) but i have sudo rights. how do i check iptables?
sudo iptables -L
nothing special...
i'm not sure what is up here .. can you get pages using telnet?
telnet www.google.com/80 ?
telnet www.google.com 80    then you have to type   GET index.html
or  GET /
stuck on trying 72.14.235.104...
i need to go,thank you for your help, i will try again later
very strange indeed
i saw similar problems on the forum but no solutions yet
thanks anyway
you still here? i'm the guy with no google
